issue.title: [Python] manylinux1 docker-compose context should be python/manylinux1
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4828](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4828). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently it doesn't find the `scripts` folder on running `docker-compose build python-manylinux1`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4828?focusedCommentId=16790663) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3864
